title: Chelsea Appoint Graham Potter
description:
Gab Marcotti joins the show to react to the death of Queen Elizabeth II. Plus, Luis Garcia and Frank Leboeuf react to Chelsea appointing Graham Potter as the next manager of the club and break down Man United's surprise loss to Real Sociedad at home.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Queen Elizabeth II dies at age 96; Graham Potter appointed Chelsea manager; Man United stumble in Europe
